body.p:
Greenupsburg Ky
April 19th 1865
Thomas E Bramlet Esqr
Dear Governor

I enclose, you the petition of the Jury, or 11 of them with the Statement of Comlth. Atty. in the case of the Commonwealth Against Huston Griffey -- for an assault. Griffey is poor with a large Family of Little Children. The Jury found him guilty of that assault. and fine $5000 they recommend the remission of it, and I fully concur with Mr Thomas Atty for Comlth. and the Jury who Sign the petition. the facts Set up in the petition, are Substantially. what was proven in the cause, yours with very Great respect
